section.title: Configuring Database Connections
section.para: You can configure OpenStack Compute to use any SQLAlchemy-compatible database. The database name is nova. If you are using nova-conductor, it will be the only service writing to the database, the other Compute services will access the database through nova-conductor.
If nova-conductor is not used, entries to the database are mostly written by the nova-scheduler service, although all the services need to be able to update entries in the database.
In either case, use these settings to configure the connection string for the nova database.
